title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
description: Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
OB: Observed Behavior: When selecting the second column and pressing delete on the keyboard, the action does not produce the expected result.
EB: Expected Behavior: The behavior of shortcut delete and menu delete should be consistent when applied to a table column.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Open the attached file in bug 124598. In the file, the second table has a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row. 
2. Select the second column and press delete on your keyboard.
